const testimonials = ref<TestimonialType[]>([
  {
    name: "Sarah Mitchell",
    role: "Marketing Director",
    company: "TechStart Inc.",
    image: "https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=Sarah",
    content: "Before Socialaize, managing our social accounts was chaos. We were spending 20+ hours a week just scheduling posts. Now our AI-powered workflows handle everything automatically, and our engagement is through the roof.",
    verificationLink: "https://g2.com/products/socialaize/reviews",
    metric: {
      value: "+750%",
      label: "Engagement Increase"
    },
    socialHandle: "@sarahmktg",
    platform: "twitter",
    followers: 12500
  },
  {
    name: "Marcus Chen",
    role: "CEO",
    company: "GrowthLabs Agency",
    image: "https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=Marcus",
    content: "As an agency managing 50+ client accounts, Socialaize has been a game-changer. The unified analytics dashboard alone saves us hours every week. Our clients love the detailed reports and our team loves the automation.",
    metric: {
      value: "15hrs",
      label: "Saved Per Week"
    },
    socialHandle: "@marcusceo",
    platform: "linkedin",
    followers: 8300
  },
  {
    name: "Jessica Rodriguez",
    role: "Content Creator",
    company: "Lifestyle & Travel",
    image: "https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=Jessica",
    content: "I went from posting sporadically to having a consistent presence across all platforms. The AI content suggestions are incredibly helpful, and I've seen my follower count double in just 3 months.",
    verificationLink: "https://g2.com/products/socialaize/reviews",
    metric: {
      value: "+250%",
      label: "Follower Growth"
    },
    socialHandle: "@jesstravel",
    platform: "instagram",
    followers: 45000
  },
  {
    name: "David Park",
    role: "Owner",
    company: "Park's Coffee Shop",
    image: "https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=David",
    content: "As a small business owner, I don't have time to be on social media all day. Socialaize lets me schedule a week's worth of content in one sitting, and the analytics show me exactly what's working. Our foot traffic has increased 40%.",
    metric: {
      value: "+40%",
      label: "Foot Traffic"
    },
    socialHandle: "@parkscoffee",
    platform: "facebook",
    followers: 3200
  },
  {
    name: "Emily Thompson",
    role: "Head of Social",
    company: "EcoWear Fashion",
    image: "https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=Emily",
    content: "The cross-platform posting is seamless. We create one piece of content and Socialaize optimizes it for each platform automatically. Our online sales from social media have tripled since we started using it.",
    verificationLink: "https://g2.com/products/socialaize/reviews",
    metric: {
      value: "3x",
      label: "Social Commerce Revenue"
    },
    socialHandle: "@ecowearfashion",
    platform: "instagram",
    followers: 28000
  },
  {
    name: "Alex Rivera",
    role: "Influencer & Coach",
    company: "Fitness Transformation",
    image: "https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=Alex",
    content: "Managing content across TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube was overwhelming. Socialaize's workflow automation means I can focus on creating quality content instead of the logistics. My engagement rate has never been better.",
    metric: {
      value: "8.5%",
      label: "Avg. Engagement Rate"
    },
    socialHandle: "@alexfitcoach",
    platform: "tiktok",
    followers: 156000
  }
]);

lines: +    content: "As a Team USA athlete, my priority is to stay laser-focused on my training and performance. Building my brand is important, but creating content shouldn't feel like a second full-time job. Socialaize lets me enjoy content creation on my own terms—automating the busywork, optimizing my reach, and even helping me craft posts that stay true to who I am. It's the behind-the-scenes teammate every athlete needs.",

+    content: "We use Socialaize to effortlessly manage and automate posting across all our accounts and every platform at the 10+ schools where we have a presence. The AI-powered analytics aggregate everything in one place, allowing us to A/B test content, optimize our strategies for each channel, and gain actionable insights in real time. Centralizing our social efforts with AI has not only saved us countless hours but has also dramatically increased our engagement and made it easy to scale our community across campuses.",

+    content: "Socialaize has been a game changer in my content workflow. It's been great not having to worry about re-posting each video onto every single platform. As someone who's managing multiple projects at once, this tool has saved me so much time! All creators or social media managers should be implementing this into their work flow!",

+    content: "Socialaize.ai feels like it was made for creators like me. It takes the stress out of running content by giving me tools that actually work in real time. Instead of juggling five different apps, I can just lock in with one platform and focus on creating. What I really like is it doesn't feel robotic. The AI understands my tone and style, so the content still feels personal. For anyone trying to grow their brand or manage multiple accounts, this isn't just another tool, it's like having an extra teammate.",

content.text:
## ✅ Testimonials Updated

**Changes made:**

1. **Commented out testimonials:**
   - Sarah Mitchell (Daily Mail)
   - Marcus Chen (Bad Apple)
   - Old Jessica Rodriguez
   - David Park
   - Emily Thompson
   - Alex Rivera

2. **Added new testimonials with quotes from VERBIAGE.md:**
   - **Trenton Mabey** - Team USA Athlete (placeholder image)
   - **Playhouse Team** - Consumer Tech Startup (placeholder image)
   - **Jessica** - Content Creator (placeholder image - ready for real photo)
   - **Jaylyn Handley** - Content Creator (placeholder image)

All testimonial content matches the quotes from VERBIAGE.md exactly. The Jessica testimonial uses a placeholder avatar that you can replace once you have her photo.
I'll update the TrustedBySectionV1.vue file to match the testimonials changes we just made.

content.text:
## ✅ TrustedBySectionV1 Updated

**Changes made:**

1. **Commented out:**
   - Daily Mail
   - Bad Apple

2. **Updated quotes from VERBIAGE.md:**
   - **Playhouse**: Updated to full quote about managing 10+ schools
   - **Trenton**: "It's the behind-the-scenes teammate every athlete needs."
   - **Jaylen**: "For anyone trying to grow their brand or manage multiple accounts, this isn't just another tool, it's like having an extra teammate."

3. **Added Jessica:**
   - New creator card with placeholder avatar
   - Quote: "All creators or social media managers should be implementing this into their work flow!"

Now you have 5 visible cards: Playhouse, BSM, Trenton, Jessica, and Jaylen. Once you have Jessica's photo, just replace the placeholder avatar URL with the actual image path.
